title: The loue of God Here is declared, if you wyl rede that god doth loue this la[n]d in dede by felynge his rod.
author: Samuel, William, fl. 1551-1569.
notes: Place of publication from STC; alludes to the accession of Elizabeth I.
Identified as STC 21690++ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
